name: node-redis-rpc
description: A simple node redis rpc implementation build on top of "node-redis-pubsub"

scripts.test-cov: node --harmony node_modules/istanbul-harmony/lib/cli.js cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha  -- -u exports --require should  --recursive test/**/*.spec.js --bail
scripts.test-travis: node --harmony node_modules/istanbul-harmony/lib/cli.js cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -u exports --require should  --recursive test/**/*.spec.js --bail
